 [<span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎נָגַשׂ‎</span> **verb** ==press, drive, oppress, exact== (Assyrian <abbr title="transliteration"><u>***naga&amp;198;šu***</u></abbr>, ***throw down***, ***overthrow***, [[BDB#Dl|Dl]]<sup>HWB 448</sup>; Arabic <img class="bdbSeriacGlyph" src="data:image/gif;base64,"> ***rouse*** and ***drive*** game, ***drive vehemently***; Ethiopic <img class="bdbSeriacGlyph" src="data:image/gif;base64,"> ***reign, wield power***, <img class="bdbSeriacGlyph" src="data:image/gif;base64,"> ***king***); — 

**Qal** ***Perfect*** <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎׳‎</span><span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎נ‎</span> [[2Kgs.23.25|2Kgs 23:25]] ***Imperfect*** <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎יִגּשֹׁ‎</span> [[Deut.15.2|Deut 15:2]] 2 masculine singular <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎תִּגּשֹׁ‎</span> [[Deut.15.3|Deut 15:3]] 2 masculine plural <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎תִּנְגּ֑שֹׁוּ‎</span> [[Isa.58.3|Isa 58:3]] — ***Participle*** <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎נֹגֵשׂ‎</span> [[Isa.9.3|Isa 9:3]] +, etc.; — 

**1.** ***press, drive*** to work (object <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎עַצְּבֵיכֶם‎</span> your workmen), [[Isa.58.3|Isa 58:3]] ([[BDB#Ges|Ges]]<sup>Comm.</sup>, [[BDB#De|De]] [[BDB#Di|Di]] [[BDB#Du|Du]]; ***exact*** [changing <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎׳‎</span><span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎ע‎</span>, q. v.] [[BDB#Che|Che]], etc.); see 

**3. 2.** ==exact with accusative== <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎כֶּסֶף‎</span>, [[2Kgs.23.35|2Kgs 23:35]] followed by accusative of person only [[Deut.15.2|Deut 15:2]]; [[Deut.15.13|Deut 15:13]]. 

**3.** Participle (= substantive) ***driver, task-master*** [[Exod.3.7|Exod 3:7]]; [[Exod.5.6|Exod 5:6]]; [[Exod.5.10|Exod 5:10]]; [[Exod.5.13|Exod 5:13]]; [[Exod.5.14|Exod 5:14]]; [[Job.3.18|Job 3:18]] (ass-) driver [[Job.39.7|Job 39:7]] of (arbitrary) ***ruler*** [[Isa.3.12|Isa 3:12]], ***ruler*** (good sense) [[Zech.10.4|Zech 10:4]] = foreign ***oppressor, tyrant*** [[Isa.9.3|Isa 9:3]] (with <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎בְּ‎</span>) [[Isa.14.2|Isa 14:2]]; [[Isa.14.4|Isa 14:4]]; [[Zech.9.8|Zech 9:8]] ***exactor*** of tribute, [[Dan.11.20|Dan 11:20]] plural abstract ***lordship = lord, ruler***, figurative of <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎צְדָקָה‎</span> (personified) [[Isa.60.17|Isa 60:17]] (\|\| <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎פְּקֻדָּתֵךְ שָׁלוֺם‎</span>). **Niph\`al** ***Perfect*** <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎נִגַּשׂ‎</span> [[1Sam.13.6|1Sam 13:6]] + 2 t. + [[Isa.3.5|Isa 3:5]] (<span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎וְ‎</span> consecutive); — ***hard pressed*** by enemy [[1Sam.13.6|1Sam 13:6]], and so [[1Sam.14.24|1Sam 14:24]] (but omitted by emendation, after [[BDB#Sept|ᵐ5]], [[BDB#The|Th]] [[BDB#We|We]] [[BDB#Dr|Dr]] [[BDB#Kit|Kit]] [[BDB#Bu|Bu]] [[BDB#HPS|HPS]]); ***treated harshly***, of suffering servant of <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎׳‎</span><span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎י‎</span> [[Isa.53.7|Isa 53:7]] reciprocal ***tyrannize over*** (<span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎׳‎</span><span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎ב‎</span>) ***each other*** [[Isa.35|Isa 35]].
